PuzzleGame.App

类 App

  • java.lang.Object
    • PuzzleGame.App.App

  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an overall App
    作者:
    Group 10 - Heather Xiong - 20722114 2022/5/12
    Function:
    This class has five main functions: 1. arrange stages, scenes, panes 2. arrange scenes, switch views 3. arrange engine's start and stop 4. provide three interfaces for user interaction: onLaunch(), onFinish(), onExit() 5. provide two life period function for internal use: launch(), finish()

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static interface  App.OnExit
      Actions taken when Exit the game
      (专用程序包) static interface  App.OnFinish
      Actions taken when Finish the game
      (专用程序包) static interface  App.OnLaunch
      Actions taken when launch the game

    • 构造器详细资料

      • App

        public App(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        App construction which add the stage, scene, engine, key or mouse input. Also allocate memory for the viewMap, currentView and the initialization for Framework, app, engine.
        参数:
        stage - Stage

      • regView

        public void regView(java.lang.String name,
                    View view)
        This function is used to add a new view into the game.
        参数:
        name - String the name of this new view which can be accessed in different view through button.
        view - View the new view be added into.

      • unregView

        public void unregView(java.lang.String name)
        delete a view from the game.
        参数:
        name - String name of the target view.
